summary: Implemented a minimal terminal panel placeholder with TUI toggle, palette action, and persisted visibility state to config.
gotcha_discovered: Textual 7.5.0 in this repo does not include a Terminal widget, so the tracer slice uses a placeholder panel with opt-in toggles.
pattern_that_worked: Persisted TUI preferences through config helpers and reused existing palette/slash command patterns for the new toggle.
scope_change: Reduced scope to a tracer-bullet placeholder panel and visibility persistence instead of a full PTY-backed terminal widget.
